author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM DANIEL FORMS IN THE FAR WESTERN EAST PACIFIC  BASIN... ...EXPECTED TO BE A SHORT-LIVED STORM...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM DANIEL FORMS IN THE FAR WESTERN EAST PACIFIC  BASIN... ...EXPECTED TO BE A SHORT-LIVED STORM...
 As of 8:00 AM PDT Sat Aug 3
 the center of Daniel was located near 12.6, -130.0
 with movement NW at 5 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
